subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: In the first boys’ singles final at Wimbledon between two Americans since 1977, Noah Rubin beat Stefan Kozlov, 6-4, 4-6, 6-3.
snippet: In the first boys’ singles final at Wimbledon between two Americans since 1977, Noah Rubin beat Stefan Kozlov, 6-4, 4-6, 6-3.
